p: The Wistar rats (200±20 g) were obtained from the Experimental Animal Center of Shanxi Medical University (Taiyuan, China), and all experimental procedures were approved by the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee of Shanxi Medical University. The animals were maintained under a 12/12 h light/dark cycle at 25±2°C and relative humidity of 60%±10%. The animals were provided free access to water and food (food was provided until 12 h before the experiment).
